channel.title: CVE Feed for wptipsntricks -- Accept Stripe Payments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wptipsntricks -- Accept Stripe Payments

item.title: CVE-2024-7353|2024-08-07T11:30:53.170Z -- wptipsntricks -- accept%20stripe%20payments
item.description: The Accept Stripe Payments plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's accept_stripe_payment_ng shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.86 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
